# 实际开发中常用的Linux命令和Android 指令

  
~~~css
- vim ~/.bashrc
~~~

## NDK添加如下信息

~~~NDK
export NDKROOT=/ndk解压目录/android-ndk-r21
export PATH=$NDKROOT:$PATH
~~~

  
## CMAKETEXT添加如下信息
~~~NDK
cmake -S . -B build

cmake --build build



cmake -S . -B build -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

cmake --build build

app.thread.scheduleLaunchActivity


add_executable()

add_library() 命令支持可选的三个互斥参数：STATIC | SHARED | MODULE

cmake -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

~~~

  


## 如何在Linux下安装cmake

~~~

sudo apt-get install cmake

  
  


如果没有安装g++,gcc,gdb，输入以下命令进行安装

sudo apt-get install build-essential

sudo apt install gdb
~~~
  
  


## 制作android系统线程方法

- 放在根目录，然后make xxx目标（去mk中看
~~~

adb push out/target/product/generic_x86/system/bin /data/local/

./android_thread



  


man abort

stdlib.h

~~~
  


the IDE is running low on memory

## 日志打印技巧：
~~~

adb shell

logcat -b all | grep hello

Log.i(TAG,"message",new Exception())

全局搜索字符串 grep "\.handleMeassage" ./ -rn

adb shell dumpsys activity activities

  
~~~



# 升级 npm
~~~

sudo apt update

sudo apt install nodejs

#不自带 npm 需要自行安装

sudo apt install npm


sudo npm install npm -g

  ~~~
  
  
~~~

//install compare software

https://www.scootersoftware.com/support.php?zz=kb_linux_install

  ~~~
~~~

buildToolsVersion = "33.0.1"

compileSdkVersion 33

sudo npm install n -g

# 下载最新稳定版

sudo n stable

# 下载最新版

sudo n lastest

# 查看已下载的版本

sudo n ls

# 切换 Node 版本

sudo n 18.21.1

~~~



# 安装React Native命令行界面。

|| appProject?.ext?.react?.enableHermes?.toBoolean()


~~~

npm install --legacy-peer-deps 解决安装问题

npm install -g react-native-cli

npm uninstall -g react-native-cli @react-native-community/cli

  
  


cd AwesomeProject

react-native run-ios

  


npm install redux // 生产环境的依赖

npm install redux -dev // 开发环境的依赖

npm uninstall redux

  
~~~
~~~

$ cd android

$ ./gradlew assembleRelease

// 实例化 metro Server启动 metro 构建 bundle处理资源文件

commandLine(*execCommand, bundleCommand, "--platform", "android", "--dev", "${devEnabled}",

"--reset-cache", "--entry-file", entryFile, "--bundle-output", jsBundleFile, "--assets-dest", resourcesDir,

"--sourcemap-output", enableHermes ? jsPackagerSourceMapFile : jsOutputSourceMapFile, *extraArgs)

ios打包：

npx react-native run-ios --configuration Release

shellScript = "export NODE_BINARY=node\n#export FORCE_BUNDLING=true\nexport BUNDLE_COMMAND=bundle\n../node_modules/react-native/scripts/react-native-xcode.sh\n";

  
  


https://gitee.com/nuogui/AndrCodeRepository.git

  


ps -ef | grep wechat | cut -c 11-16 | xargs sudo kill -9

  


ps -ef | grep -v wechat | cut -c 12-18

  
  ~~~


# 安装闹钟

- Find Pomodoro in Software Center or run


~~~
#git clone -b gnome-41 https://github.com/gnome-pomodoro/gnome-pomodoro.git

sudo apt-get install gnome-shell-pomodo

安装命令 sudo dpkg -i 文件名.deb

启动命令 /usr/local/sunlogin/bin/sunloginclient

卸载命令 sudo dpkg -r sunloginclient

  ~~~
  
  
~~~
uname -v

lsb_release -a


http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu xenial InRelease: 由于没有公钥，无法验证下列签名： NO_PUBKEY 40976EAF437D05B5 NO_PUBKEY 3B4FE6ACC0B21F32



sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 40976EAF437D05B5

sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 3B4FE6ACC0B21F32

  
~~~
  

~~~

1.查看安装的所有软件

dpkg -l

例如：dpkg -l | grep ftp

  


2.查看软件安装的路径

dpkg -L | grep ftp

也可以用 whereis ftp

  


3.查看软件版本

aptitude show xxx

  


安装应用时使用

apt-get install

卸载应用时使用

sudo apt remove program_name

完全卸载应用

sudo apt purge program_name

如果不知道具体的应用名称或者开头字母，你可以 列出 Ubuntu 中所有已安装的包

apt list --installed | grep -i xxx

  


snap list

  


nano

字符终端文本编辑器

sudo nano /etc/pam.d/common-password

使用Ctrl+O来保存所做的修改 退出 按Ctrl+X

  


sudo passwd root 给root用户修改密码

su root 切换用户

  


root密码：52101985zzMzzM*

  
~~~


repo安装

sudo apt install repo

  


git config --global user.email "teitibou@163.com"

git config --global user.name "teitibou"

  
  


sudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list //在行尾添加如下两行的内容

deb http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ xenial main universe

deb-src http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ xenial main universe

  


cat /proc/cpuinfo来查看相关的cpu信息

lsb_release -a，查看发行版本信息，并且方法可以适用于所有的Linux发行版本。

  


cat /etc/issue可以查看到当前是Linux什么版本系统。

cat /proc/version可以查看内核的版本号。

  


which java 查找java

ls -lrt /usr/bin/java 查找文件快捷链接原地址

ln -s /usr/local/jvm/jdk1.8.0_303/ /usr/jdk 创建一个软连接

  


/usr/lib/jvm/java-11-openjdk-amd64/bin/java

  


du -sh ./folder ubuntu 查看文件夹大小

/usr/lib/jvm/java-11-openjdk-amd64

  


// 打开/etc/apt/sources.list

sudo nano /etc/apt/sources.list

//在最后粘贴以下两行

deb http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ xenial main universe

deb-src http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ xenial main universe

//ctrl +s 保存，ctrl + x退出

//在terminal执行

sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install libesd0-dev

  
  


工作有意义，生活有品质 git 操作operator

sanyusily.github.io/mdbook_site

  


$ git remote add origin https://github.com/sanyusily/sanyusily.github.io.git

$ git remote add origin git@github.com:sanyusily/sanyusily.github.io.git

  


$ git stash

$ git pull --rebase origin master

# change to your github repo

$ git stash pop

$ git rebase --continue

  


$ git branch -M develop

$ git push -u origin develop

  


mkdir quickstart-react-native

cd quickstart-react-native

git init

touch README.md

git add README.md

git commit -m "first commit"

git remote add origin https://gitee.com/sanyusily/quickstart-react-native.git

git push -u origin "master"

  
  
  


git branch --set-upstream-to=origin/master master

因为远程仓库新建时，有LIENCE，由于本地仓库和远程仓库有不同的开始点，也就是两个仓库没有共同的commit出现，无法提交，此时我们需要allow-unrelated-histories。也就是我们的 pull 命令改为下面这样的：

git pull origin master --allow-unrelated-histories

  


git remote -v

git remote add 仓库地址

git remote rm 仓库名称

  


$ ssh-keygen -t rsa

$ cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub

  


$ code . 打开vscode

  


解决git每次提交代码都要输入帐号密码

git config --global credential.helper store

  
  


github.com/oh-my-docker/jekyll-docker

  


$ sudo apt install docker.io

  
  
  


$ sudo apt-get install ruby ruby-dev 安装Ruby包和开发工具：

$ sudo apt-get install make build-essential 必需的构建工具

$ sudo gem install bundler 依赖包安装

$ sudo gem install jekyll

bundle exec jekyll -v

bundle exec jekyll serve

  


卸载重新安装jekyll

PACKAGES="$(dpkg -l |grep jekyll|cut -d" " -f3|xargs )"

sudo apt remove --purge $PACKAGES

sudo apt autoremove

sudo gem install jekyll jekyll-feed jekyll-gist jekyll-paginate jekyll-sass-converter jekyll-coffeescript

bundle update

  


bundle exec jekyll new myblog

bundle exec jekyll serve

  
  
  
  


https://github.com/oh-my-docker/jekyll-docker

  


docker pull quay.io/jetstack/cert-manager-cainjector:v0.12.0

docker pull quay-mirror.qiniu.com/jetstack/cert-manager-cainjector:v0.12.0

  


docker pull quay-mirror.qiniu.com/omd/jekyll

$ docker pull quay.io/omd/jekyll

$ docker pull quay-mirror.qiniu.com/omd/jekyll

  
  
  


## 使用 Jekyll 获取源代码 使用主题让博客更美观

~~~
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCmlhPmTdqYhRWwWZWSIBwGw/featured

https://gist.github.com/biezhi

http://open-developer.blogspot.com/search?q=jekyll

https://github.com/myanbin/myanbin.github.io
~~~

$ git rebase --continue

  


$ git branch -M develop

$ git push -u origin develop

touch README.md

git add README.md

git commit -m "first commit"

git remote add origin https://gitee.com/sanyusily/quickstart-react-native.git

git push -u origin "master"

  
  
  


git branch --set-upstream-to=origin/master master

因为远程仓库新建时，有LIENCE，由于本地仓库和远程仓库有不同的开始点，也就是两个仓库没有共同的commit出现，无法提交，此时我们需要allow-unrelated-histories。也就是我们的 pull 命令改为下面这样的：

git pull origin master --allow-unrelated-histories

  


git remote -v

git remote rm 仓库名称

  


$ ssh-keygen -t rsa

$ cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub

  


$ code . 打开vscode

  


解决git每次提交代码都要输入帐号密码

git config --global credential.helper store

  
  


github.com/oh-my-docker/jekyll-docker

  


$ sudo apt install docker.io

  
  
  


$ sudo apt-get install ruby ruby-dev 安装Ruby包和开发工具：

$ sudo apt-get install make build-essential 必需的构建工具

$ sudo gem install bundler 依赖包安装

$ sudo gem install jekyll

bundle exec jekyll -v

bundle exec jekyll serve

sudo apt autoremove

bundle update

  


bundle exec jekyll new myblog

bundle exec jekyll serve

# 实际开发中常用的Linux命令和Android 指令

  
~~~css
- vim ~/.bashrc
~~~

## NDK添加如下信息

~~~NDK
export NDKROOT=/ndk解压目录/android-ndk-r21
export PATH=$NDKROOT:$PATH
~~~

  
## CMAKETEXT添加如下信息
~~~NDK
cmake -S . -B build

cmake --build build



cmake -S . -B build -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

cmake --build build

app.thread.scheduleLaunchActivity


add_executable()

add_library() 命令支持可选的三个互斥参数：STATIC | SHARED | MODULE

cmake -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

~~~

  


## 如何在Linux下安装cmake

~~~

sudo apt-get install cmake

  
  


如果没有安装g++,gcc,gdb，输入以下命令进行安装

sudo apt-get install build-essential

sudo apt install gdb
~~~
  
  


## 制作android系统线程方法

- 放在根目录，然后make xxx目标（去mk中看
~~~

adb push out/target/product/generic_x86/system/bin /data/local/

./android_thread



  


man abort

stdlib.h

~~~
  


the IDE is running low on memory

## 日志打印技巧：
~~~

adb shell

logcat -b all | grep hello

Log.i(TAG,"message",new Exception())

全局搜索字符串 grep "\.handleMeassage" ./ -rn

adb shell dumpsys activity activities

  
~~~



# 升级 npm
~~~

sudo apt update

sudo apt install nodejs

#不自带 npm 需要自行安装

sudo apt install npm


sudo npm install npm -g

  ~~~
  
  
~~~

//install compare software

https://www.scootersoftware.com/support.php?zz=kb_linux_install

  ~~~
~~~

buildToolsVersion = "33.0.1"

compileSdkVersion 33

sudo npm install n -g

# 下载最新稳定版

sudo n stable

# 下载最新版

sudo n lastest

# 查看已下载的版本

sudo n ls

# 切换 Node 版本

sudo n 18.21.1

  ~~~



# 安装React Native命令行界面。

|| appProject?.ext?.react?.enableHermes?.toBoolean()


  ~~~

npm install --legacy-peer-deps 解决安装问题

npm install -g react-native-cli

npm uninstall -g react-native-cli @react-native-community/cli

  
  


cd AwesomeProject

react-native run-ios

  


npm install redux // 生产环境的依赖

npm install redux -dev // 开发环境的依赖

npm uninstall redux

  
  
  ~~~

  ~~~

$ cd android

$ ./gradlew assembleRelease

// 实例化 metro Server启动 metro 构建 bundle处理资源文件

commandLine(*execCommand, bundleCommand, "--platform", "android", "--dev", "${devEnabled}",

"--reset-cache", "--entry-file", entryFile, "--bundle-output", jsBundleFile, "--assets-dest", resourcesDir,

"--sourcemap-output", enableHermes ? jsPackagerSourceMapFile : jsOutputSourceMapFile, *extraArgs)

npx react-native run-ios --configuration Release

shellScript = "export NODE_BINARY=node\n#export FORCE_BUNDLING=true\nexport BUNDLE_COMMAND=bundle\n../node_modules/react-native/scripts/react-native-xcode.sh\n";

ps -ef | grep wechat | cut -c 11-16 | xargs sudo kill -9

  


ps -ef | grep -v wechat | cut -c 12-18

  
  ~~~

卸载命令 sudo dpkg -r sunloginclient

  ~~~

lsb_release -a


http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu xenial InRelease: 由于没有公钥，无法验证下列签名： NO_PUBKEY 40976EAF437D05B5 NO_PUBKEY 3B4FE6ACC0B21F32

sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 3B4FE6ACC0B21F32

apt-get install

sudo apt remove program_name

sudo apt purge program_name

# 实际开发中常用的Linux命令和Android 指令

  
~~~css
- vim ~/.bashrc
~~~

## NDK添加如下信息

~~~NDK
export NDKROOT=/ndk解压目录/android-ndk-r21
export PATH=$NDKROOT:$PATH
~~~

  
## CMAKETEXT添加如下信息
~~~NDK
cmake -S . -B build

cmake --build build



cmake -S . -B build -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

cmake --build build

app.thread.scheduleLaunchActivity


add_executable()

add_library() 命令支持可选的三个互斥参数：STATIC | SHARED | MODULE

cmake -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

~~~

  


## 如何在Linux下安装cmake

~~~

sudo apt-get install cmake

  
  


如果没有安装g++,gcc,gdb，输入以下命令进行安装

sudo apt install gdb
~~~

# 实际开发中常用的Linux命令和Android 指令

  
~~~css
- vim ~/.bashrc
~~~

## NDK添加如下信息

~~~NDK
export NDKROOT=/ndk解压目录/android-ndk-r21
export PATH=$NDKROOT:$PATH
~~~

  
## CMAKETEXT添加如下信息
~~~NDK
cmake -S . -B build

cmake --build build



cmake -S . -B build -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

cmake --build build

app.thread.scheduleLaunchActivity


add_executable()

add_library() 命令支持可选的三个互斥参数：STATIC | SHARED | MODULE

cmake -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

~~~

  


## 如何在Linux下安装cmake

~~~

sudo apt-get install cmake

  
  


如果没有安装g++,gcc,gdb，输入以下命令进行安装

sudo apt-get install build-essential

sudo apt install gdb
~~~
  
  


## 制作android系统线程方法

- 放在根目录，然后make xxx目标（去mk中看
~~~

adb push out/target/product/generic_x86/system/bin /data/local/

./android_thread



  


man abort

stdlib.h

~~~
  


the IDE is running low on memory

## 日志打印技巧：
~~~

adb shell

logcat -b all | grep hello

Log.i(TAG,"message",new Exception())

全局搜索字符串 grep "\.handleMeassage" ./ -rn

adb shell dumpsys activity activities

  
~~~



# 升级 npm
~~~

sudo apt update

sudo apt install nodejs

#不自带 npm 需要自行安装

sudo apt install npm


sudo npm install npm -g

  ~~~
  
  
~~~

//install compare software

https://www.scootersoftware.com/support.php?zz=kb_linux_install

  ~~~
~~~

buildToolsVersion = "33.0.1"

compileSdkVersion 33

sudo npm install n -g

# 下载最新稳定版

sudo n stable

# 下载最新版

sudo n lastest

# 查看已下载的版本

sudo n ls

# 切换 Node 版本

sudo n 18.21.1

  ~~~



# 安装React Native命令行界面。

|| appProject?.ext?.react?.enableHermes?.toBoolean()


  ~~~

npm install --legacy-peer-deps 解决安装问题

npm install -g react-native-cli

npm uninstall -g react-native-cli @react-native-community/cli

  
  


cd AwesomeProject

react-native run-ios

  


npm install redux // 生产环境的依赖

npm install redux -dev // 开发环境的依赖

npm uninstall redux

  
  
  ~~~

  ~~~

$ cd android

$ ./gradlew assembleRelease

// 实例化 metro Server启动 metro 构建 bundle处理资源文件

commandLine(*execCommand, bundleCommand, "--platform", "android", "--dev", "${devEnabled}",

"--reset-cache", "--entry-file", entryFile, "--bundle-output", jsBundleFile, "--assets-dest", resourcesDir,

"--sourcemap-output", enableHermes ? jsPackagerSourceMapFile : jsOutputSourceMapFile, *extraArgs)

npx react-native run-ios --configuration Release

shellScript = "export NODE_BINARY=node\n#export FORCE_BUNDLING=true\nexport BUNDLE_COMMAND=bundle\n../node_modules/react-native/scripts/react-native-xcode.sh\n";

  
  


https://gitee.com/nuogui/AndrCodeRepository.git

  


ps -ef | grep wechat | cut -c 11-16 | xargs sudo kill -9

  


ps -ef | grep -v wechat | cut -c 12-18

  
  ~~~

- Find Pomodoro in Software Center or run


~~~
#git clone -b gnome-41 https://github.com/gnome-pomodoro/gnome-pomodoro.git

sudo apt-get install gnome-shell-pomodo

安装命令 sudo dpkg -i 文件名.deb

启动命令 /usr/local/sunlogin/bin/sunloginclient

卸载命令 sudo dpkg -r sunloginclient

  ~~~
  
  
~~~
uname -v

lsb_release -a


http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu xenial InRelease: 由于没有公钥，无法验证下列签名： NO_PUBKEY 40976EAF437D05B5 NO_PUBKEY 3B4FE6ACC0B21F32



sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 40976EAF437D05B5

sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 3B4FE6ACC0B21F32

  
~~~
  

~~~

1.查看安装的所有软件

dpkg -l

2.查看软件安装的路径

dpkg -L | grep ftp

也可以用 whereis ftp

  


3.查看软件版本

aptitude show xxx

  


安装应用时使用

apt-get install

卸载应用时使用

sudo apt remove program_name

完全卸载应用

sudo apt purge program_name

如果不知道具体的应用名称或者开头字母，你可以 列出 Ubuntu 中所有已安装的包

apt list --installed | grep -i xxx

  


snap list

  


nano

字符终端文本编辑器

sudo nano /etc/pam.d/common-password

使用Ctrl+O来保存所做的修改 退出 按Ctrl+X

su root 切换用户

  


root密码：52101985zzMzzM*

  
~~~

git config --global user.name "teitibou"

deb-src http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ xenial main universe

  


cat /proc/cpuinfo来查看相关的cpu信息

cat /etc/issue可以查看到当前是Linux什么版本系统。

/usr/lib/jvm/java-11-openjdk-amd64/bin/java

  


du -sh ./folder ubuntu 查看文件夹大小

/usr/lib/jvm/java-11-openjdk-amd64

git remote -v

# 实际开发中常用的Linux命令和Android 指令

  
~~~css
- vim ~/.bashrc
~~~

## NDK添加如下信息

~~~NDK
export NDKROOT=/ndk解压目录/android-ndk-r21
export PATH=$NDKROOT:$PATH
~~~

  
## CMAKETEXT添加如下信息
~~~NDK
cmake -S . -B build

cmake --build build



cmake -S . -B build -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

cmake --build build

app.thread.scheduleLaunchActivity


add_executable()

add_library() 命令支持可选的三个互斥参数：STATIC | SHARED | MODULE

cmake -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

~~~

  


## 如何在Linux下安装cmake

~~~

sudo apt-get install cmake

  
  


如果没有安装g++,gcc,gdb，输入以下命令进行安装

sudo apt-get install build-essential

sudo apt install gdb
~~~
  
  


## 制作android系统线程方法

- 放在根目录，然后make xxx目标（去mk中看
~~~

adb push out/target/product/generic_x86/system/bin /data/local/

./android_thread



  


man abort

stdlib.h

~~~
  


the IDE is running low on memory

## 日志打印技巧：
~~~

adb shell

logcat -b all | grep hello

Log.i(TAG,"message",new Exception())

全局搜索字符串 grep "\.handleMeassage" ./ -rn

adb shell dumpsys activity activities

  
~~~



# 升级 npm
~~~

sudo apt update

sudo apt install nodejs

#不自带 npm 需要自行安装

sudo apt install npm


sudo npm install npm -g

  ~~~
  
  
~~~

//install compare software

https://www.scootersoftware.com/support.php?zz=kb_linux_install

  ~~~
~~~

buildToolsVersion = "33.0.1"

compileSdkVersion 33

sudo npm install n -g

# 下载最新稳定版

# 下载最新版

sudo n lastest

# 查看已下载的版本

sudo n ls

# 切换 Node 版本

sudo n 18.21.1

|| appProject?.ext?.react?.enableHermes?.toBoolean()


  ~~~

npm install --legacy-peer-deps 解决安装问题

npm install -g react-native-cli

npm uninstall -g react-native-cli @react-native-community/cli

  
  


cd AwesomeProject

react-native run-ios

  


npm install redux // 生产环境的依赖

npm install redux -dev // 开发环境的依赖

npm uninstall redux

  
  
  ~~~

  ~~~

$ cd android

$ ./gradlew assembleRelease

// 实例化 metro Server启动 metro 构建 bundle处理资源文件

commandLine(*execCommand, bundleCommand, "--platform", "android", "--dev", "${devEnabled}",

"--reset-cache", "--entry-file", entryFile, "--bundle-output", jsBundleFile, "--assets-dest", resourcesDir,

adb shell

logcat -b all | grep hello

Log.i(TAG,"message",new Exception())

全局搜索字符串 grep "\.handleMeassage" ./ -rn

adb shell dumpsys activity activities

  
~~~



# 升级 npm
~~~

sudo apt update

sudo apt install nodejs

#不自带 npm 需要自行安装

sudo apt install npm


sudo npm install npm -g

  ~~~
  
  
~~~

//install compare software

https://www.scootersoftware.com/support.php?zz=kb_linux_install

  ~~~
~~~

buildToolsVersion = "33.0.1"

compileSdkVersion 33

sudo npm install n -g

# 下载最新稳定版

sudo n stable

# 下载最新版

sudo n lastest

# 查看已下载的版本

sudo n ls

# 切换 Node 版本

sudo n 18.21.1

  ~~~



# 安装React Native命令行界面。

|| appProject?.ext?.react?.enableHermes?.toBoolean()


  ~~~

npm install --legacy-peer-deps 解决安装问题

npm install -g react-native-cli

npm uninstall -g react-native-cli @react-native-community/cli

  
  


cd AwesomeProject

react-native run-ios

  


npm install redux // 生产环境的依赖

npm install redux -dev // 开发环境的依赖

npm uninstall redux

  
  
  ~~~

  ~~~

$ cd android

$ ./gradlew assembleRelease

// 实例化 metro Server启动 metro 构建 bundle处理资源文件

commandLine(*execCommand, bundleCommand, "--platform", "android", "--dev", "${devEnabled}",

"--reset-cache", "--entry-file", entryFile, "--bundle-output", jsBundleFile, "--assets-dest", resourcesDir,

"--sourcemap-output", enableHermes ? jsPackagerSourceMapFile : jsOutputSourceMapFile, *extraArgs)

ios打包：

npx react-native run-ios --configuration Release

shellScript = "export NODE_BINARY=node\n#export FORCE_BUNDLING=true\nexport BUNDLE_COMMAND=bundle\n../node_modules/react-native/scripts/react-native-xcode.sh\n";

  
  


https://gitee.com/nuogui/AndrCodeRepository.git

  


ps -ef | grep wechat | cut -c 11-16 | xargs sudo kill -9

  


ps -ef | grep -v wechat | cut -c 12-18

  
  ~~~


# 安装闹钟

- Find Pomodoro in Software Center or run


~~~
#git clone -b gnome-41 https://github.com/gnome-pomodoro/gnome-pomodoro.git

sudo apt-get install gnome-shell-pomodo

安装命令 sudo dpkg -i 文件名.deb

启动命令 /usr/local/sunlogin/bin/sunloginclient

卸载命令 sudo dpkg -r sunloginclient

  ~~~
  
  
~~~
uname -v

lsb_release -a


http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu xenial InRelease: 由于没有公钥，无法验证下列签名： NO_PUBKEY 40976EAF437D05B5 NO_PUBKEY 3B4FE6ACC0B21F32



sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 40976EAF437D05B5

sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 3B4FE6ACC0B21F32

  
~~~
  

~~~

1.查看安装的所有软件

dpkg -l

例如：dpkg -l | grep ftp

  


2.查看软件安装的路径

dpkg -L | grep ftp

也可以用 whereis ftp

  


3.查看软件版本

aptitude show xxx

  


安装应用时使用

apt-get install

卸载应用时使用

sudo apt remove program_name

完全卸载应用

sudo apt purge program_name

如果不知道具体的应用名称或者开头字母，你可以 列出 Ubuntu 中所有已安装的包

apt list --installed | grep -i xxx

  


snap list

  


nano

字符终端文本编辑器

sudo nano /etc/pam.d/common-password

使用Ctrl+O来保存所做的修改 退出 按Ctrl+X

  


sudo passwd root 给root用户修改密码

su root 切换用户

  


root密码：52101985zzMzzM*

  
~~~


repo安装

sudo apt install repo

  


git config --global user.email "teitibou@163.com"

git config --global user.name "teitibou"

  
  


sudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list //在行尾添加如下两行的内容

deb http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ xenial main universe

deb-src http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ xenial main universe

  


cat /proc/cpuinfo来查看相关的cpu信息

lsb_release -a，查看发行版本信息，并且方法可以适用于所有的Linux发行版本。

  


cat /etc/issue可以查看到当前是Linux什么版本系统。

cat /proc/version可以查看内核的版本号。

  


which java 查找java

ls -lrt /usr/bin/java 查找文件快捷链接原地址

ln -s /usr/local/jvm/jdk1.8.0_303/ /usr/jdk 创建一个软连接

  


/usr/lib/jvm/java-11-openjdk-amd64/bin/java

  


du -sh ./folder ubuntu 查看文件夹大小

/usr/lib/jvm/java-11-openjdk-amd64

  


// 打开/etc/apt/sources.list

sudo nano /etc/apt/sources.list

//在最后粘贴以下两行

deb http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ xenial main universe

deb-src http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ xenial main universe

//ctrl +s 保存，ctrl + x退出

//在terminal执行

sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install libesd0-dev

  
  


工作有意义，生活有品质 git 操作operator

sanyusily.github.io/mdbook_site

  


$ git remote add origin https://github.com/sanyusily/sanyusily.github.io.git

$ git remote add origin git@github.com:sanyusily/sanyusily.github.io.git

  


$ git stash

$ git pull --rebase origin master

# change to your github repo

$ git stash pop

$ git rebase --continue

  


$ git branch -M develop

$ git push -u origin develop

  


mkdir quickstart-react-native

cd quickstart-react-native

git init

touch README.md

git add README.md

git commit -m "first commit"

git remote add origin https://gitee.com/sanyusily/quickstart-react-native.git

git push -u origin "master"

  
  
  


git branch --set-upstream-to=origin/master master

因为远程仓库新建时，有LIENCE，由于本地仓库和远程仓库有不同的开始点，也就是两个仓库没有共同的commit出现，无法提交，此时我们需要allow-unrelated-histories。也就是我们的 pull 命令改为下面这样的：

git pull origin master --allow-unrelated-histories

  


git remote -v

git remote add 仓库地址

git remote rm 仓库名称

  


$ ssh-keygen -t rsa

$ cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub

  


$ code . 打开vscode

  


解决git每次提交代码都要输入帐号密码

git config --global credential.helper store

  
  


github.com/oh-my-docker/jekyll-docker

  


$ sudo apt install docker.io

  
  
  


$ sudo apt-get install ruby ruby-dev 安装Ruby包和开发工具：

$ sudo apt-get install make build-essential 必需的构建工具

$ sudo gem install bundler 依赖包安装

$ sudo gem install jekyll

bundle exec jekyll -v

bundle exec jekyll serve

  


卸载重新安装jekyll

PACKAGES="$(dpkg -l |grep jekyll|cut -d" " -f3|xargs )"

sudo apt remove --purge $PACKAGES

sudo apt autoremove

sudo gem install jekyll jekyll-feed jekyll-gist jekyll-paginate jekyll-sass-converter jekyll-coffeescript

bundle update

  


bundle exec jekyll new myblog

bundle exec jekyll serve

  
  
  
  


https://github.com/oh-my-docker/jekyll-docker

  


docker pull quay.io/jetstack/cert-manager-cainjector:v0.12.0

docker pull quay-mirror.qiniu.com/jetstack/cert-manager-cainjector:v0.12.0

  


docker pull quay-mirror.qiniu.com/omd/jekyll

$ docker pull quay.io/omd/jekyll

$ docker pull quay-mirror.qiniu.com/omd/jekyll

# 实际开发中常用的Linux命令和Android 指令

  
~~~css

~~~

## NDK添加如下信息

~~~NDK

~~~

~~~NDK

cmake --build build



cmake -S . -B build -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

cmake --build build

app.thread.scheduleLaunchActivity


add_executable()

add_library() 命令支持可选的三个互斥参数：STATIC | SHARED | MODULE

cmake -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

~~~

sudo apt install gdb

## NDK添加如下信息

~~~NDK
export NDKROOT=/ndk解压目录/android-ndk-r21
export PATH=$NDKROOT:$PATH
~~~

  
## CMAKETEXT添加如下信息
~~~NDK
cmake -S . -B build

cmake --build build



cmake -S . -B build -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

cmake --build build

app.thread.scheduleLaunchActivity


add_executable()

add_library() 命令支持可选的三个互斥参数：STATIC | SHARED | MODULE

cmake -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

~~~

  


## 如何在Linux下安装cmake

~~~

sudo apt-get install cmake

  
  


如果没有安装g++,gcc,gdb，输入以下命令进行安装

sudo apt-get install build-essential

sudo apt install gdb
~~~

~~~

adb push out/target/product/generic_x86/system/bin /data/local/

./android_thread



  


man abort

stdlib.h

~~~

# 实际开发中常用的Linux命令和Android 指令

  
~~~css
- vim ~/.bashrc
~~~

## NDK添加如下信息

~~~NDK
export NDKROOT=/ndk解压目录/android-ndk-r21
export PATH=$NDKROOT:$PATH
~~~

  
## CMAKETEXT添加如下信息
~~~NDK
cmake -S . -B build

cmake --build build



cmake -S . -B build -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

cmake --build build

app.thread.scheduleLaunchActivity


add_executable()

add_library() 命令支持可选的三个互斥参数：STATIC | SHARED | MODULE

cmake -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

~~~

  


## 如何在Linux下安装cmake

~~~

sudo apt-get install cmake

  
  


如果没有安装g++,gcc,gdb，输入以下命令进行安装

sudo apt-get install build-essential

sudo apt install gdb
~~~
  
  


## 制作android系统线程方法

- 放在根目录，然后make xxx目标（去mk中看
~~~

adb push out/target/product/generic_x86/system/bin /data/local/

./android_thread



  


man abort

stdlib.h

~~~
  


the IDE is running low on memory

## 日志打印技巧：
~~~

adb shell

logcat -b all | grep hello

Log.i(TAG,"message",new Exception())

全局搜索字符串 grep "\.handleMeassage" ./ -rn

adb shell dumpsys activity activities

  
~~~



# 升级 npm
~~~

sudo apt update

sudo apt install nodejs

#不自带 npm 需要自行安装

sudo apt install npm


sudo npm install npm -g

  ~~~
  
  
~~~

//install compare software

https://www.scootersoftware.com/support.php?zz=kb_linux_install

  ~~~
~~~

buildToolsVersion = "33.0.1"

compileSdkVersion 33

sudo npm install n -g

# 下载最新稳定版

sudo n stable

# 下载最新版

sudo n lastest

# 查看已下载的版本

sudo n ls

# 切换 Node 版本

sudo n 18.21.1

  ~~~



# 安装React Native命令行界面。

|| appProject?.ext?.react?.enableHermes?.toBoolean()


  ~~~

npm install --legacy-peer-deps 解决安装问题

npm install -g react-native-cli

npm uninstall -g react-native-cli @react-native-community/cli

  
  


cd AwesomeProject

react-native run-ios

  


npm install redux // 生产环境的依赖

npm install redux -dev // 开发环境的依赖

npm uninstall redux

  
  
  ~~~

  ~~~

$ cd android

$ ./gradlew assembleRelease

// 实例化 metro Server启动 metro 构建 bundle处理资源文件

commandLine(*execCommand, bundleCommand, "--platform", "android", "--dev", "${devEnabled}",

"--reset-cache", "--entry-file", entryFile, "--bundle-output", jsBundleFile, "--assets-dest", resourcesDir,

  ~~~

  ~~~

lsb_release -a

sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 3B4FE6ACC0B21F32

卸载应用时使用

sudo apt remove program_name

sudo apt purge program_name

snap list

  


nano

# 实际开发中常用的Linux命令和Android 指令

  
~~~css
- vim ~/.bashrc
~~~

## NDK添加如下信息

~~~NDK
export NDKROOT=/ndk解压目录/android-ndk-r21
export PATH=$NDKROOT:$PATH
~~~

  
## CMAKETEXT添加如下信息
~~~NDK
cmake -S . -B build

cmake --build build



cmake -S . -B build -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

cmake --build build

app.thread.scheduleLaunchActivity


add_executable()

add_library() 命令支持可选的三个互斥参数：STATIC | SHARED | MODULE

cmake -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

~~~

  


## 如何在Linux下安装cmake

~~~

sudo apt-get install cmake

  
  


如果没有安装g++,gcc,gdb，输入以下命令进行安装

sudo apt-get install build-essential

sudo apt install gdb
~~~
  
  


## 制作android系统线程方法

- 放在根目录，然后make xxx目标（去mk中看
~~~

adb push out/target/product/generic_x86/system/bin /data/local/

./android_thread



  


man abort

stdlib.h

~~~
  


the IDE is running low on memory

## 日志打印技巧：
~~~

adb shell

logcat -b all | grep hello

Log.i(TAG,"message",new Exception())

全局搜索字符串 grep "\.handleMeassage" ./ -rn

adb shell dumpsys activity activities

  
~~~



# 升级 npm
~~~

sudo apt update

sudo apt install nodejs

#不自带 npm 需要自行安装

sudo apt install npm


sudo npm install npm -g

  ~~~
  
  
~~~

//install compare software

https://www.scootersoftware.com/support.php?zz=kb_linux_install

  ~~~
~~~

buildToolsVersion = "33.0.1"

compileSdkVersion 33

sudo npm install n -g

# 下载最新稳定版

sudo n stable

# 下载最新版

sudo n lastest

# 查看已下载的版本

sudo n ls

# 切换 Node 版本

sudo n 18.21.1

  ~~~



# 安装React Native命令行界面。

|| appProject?.ext?.react?.enableHermes?.toBoolean()


  ~~~

npm install --legacy-peer-deps 解决安装问题

npm install -g react-native-cli

npm uninstall -g react-native-cli @react-native-community/cli

  
  


cd AwesomeProject

react-native run-ios

  


npm install redux // 生产环境的依赖

npm install redux -dev // 开发环境的依赖

npm uninstall redux

  
  
  ~~~

  ~~~

$ cd android

$ ./gradlew assembleRelease

// 实例化 metro Server启动 metro 构建 bundle处理资源文件

commandLine(*execCommand, bundleCommand, "--platform", "android", "--dev", "${devEnabled}",

"--reset-cache", "--entry-file", entryFile, "--bundle-output", jsBundleFile, "--assets-dest", resourcesDir,

"--sourcemap-output", enableHermes ? jsPackagerSourceMapFile : jsOutputSourceMapFile, *extraArgs)

ps -ef | grep wechat | cut -c 11-16 | xargs sudo kill -9

  


ps -ef | grep -v wechat | cut -c 12-18

  
  ~~~

lsb_release -a

sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 3B4FE6ACC0B21F32

sudo apt remove program_name

sudo apt purge program_name

snap list

  


nano

$ git remote add origin https://github.com/sanyusily/sanyusily.github.io.git

$ git remote add origin git@github.com:sanyusily/sanyusily.github.io.git

  


$ git stash

$ git pull --rebase origin master

# change to your github repo

$ git stash pop

$ git rebase --continue

  


$ git branch -M develop

$ git push -u origin develop

  


mkdir quickstart-react-native

cd quickstart-react-native

git init

touch README.md

git add README.md

git commit -m "first commit"

git remote add origin https://gitee.com/sanyusily/quickstart-react-native.git

git push -u origin "master"

  
  
  


git branch --set-upstream-to=origin/master master

因为远程仓库新建时，有LIENCE，由于本地仓库和远程仓库有不同的开始点，也就是两个仓库没有共同的commit出现，无法提交，此时我们需要allow-unrelated-histories。也就是我们的 pull 命令改为下面这样的：

git pull origin master --allow-unrelated-histories

  


git remote -v

git remote add 仓库地址

git remote rm 仓库名称

  


$ ssh-keygen -t rsa

$ cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub

  


$ code . 打开vscode

  


解决git每次提交代码都要输入帐号密码

git config --global credential.helper store

  
  


github.com/oh-my-docker/jekyll-docker

  


$ sudo apt install docker.io

  
  
  


$ sudo apt-get install ruby ruby-dev 安装Ruby包和开发工具：

$ sudo apt-get install make build-essential 必需的构建工具

$ sudo gem install bundler 依赖包安装

$ sudo gem install jekyll

bundle exec jekyll -v

bundle exec jekyll serve

  


卸载重新安装jekyll

PACKAGES="$(dpkg -l |grep jekyll|cut -d" " -f3|xargs )"

sudo apt remove --purge $PACKAGES

sudo apt autoremove

sudo gem install jekyll jekyll-feed jekyll-gist jekyll-paginate jekyll-sass-converter jekyll-coffeescript

bundle update

  


bundle exec jekyll new myblog

bundle exec jekyll serve

  
  
  
  


https://github.com/oh-my-docker/jekyll-docker

  


docker pull quay.io/jetstack/cert-manager-cainjector:v0.12.0

docker pull quay-mirror.qiniu.com/jetstack/cert-manager-cainjector:v0.12.0

# 实际开发中常用的Linux命令和Android 指令

  
~~~css
- vim ~/.bashrc
~~~

## NDK添加如下信息

~~~NDK
export NDKROOT=/ndk解压目录/android-ndk-r21
export PATH=$NDKROOT:$PATH
~~~

  
## CMAKETEXT添加如下信息
~~~NDK
cmake -S . -B build

cmake --build build



cmake -S . -B build -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

cmake --build build

app.thread.scheduleLaunchActivity


add_executable()

add_library() 命令支持可选的三个互斥参数：STATIC | SHARED | MODULE

cmake -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

~~~

  


## 如何在Linux下安装cmake

~~~

sudo apt-get install cmake

  
  


如果没有安装g++,gcc,gdb，输入以下命令进行安装

sudo apt-get install build-essential

sudo apt install gdb
~~~
  
  


## 制作android系统线程方法

- 放在根目录，然后make xxx目标（去mk中看
~~~

adb push out/target/product/generic_x86/system/bin /data/local/

./android_thread



  


man abort

stdlib.h

~~~
  


the IDE is running low on memory

## 日志打印技巧：
~~~

adb shell

logcat -b all | grep hello

Log.i(TAG,"message",new Exception())

全局搜索字符串 grep "\.handleMeassage" ./ -rn

adb shell dumpsys activity activities

  
~~~



# 升级 npm
~~~

sudo apt update

sudo apt install nodejs

#不自带 npm 需要自行安装

sudo apt install npm


sudo npm install npm -g

  ~~~
  
  
~~~

//install compare software

https://www.scootersoftware.com/support.php?zz=kb_linux_install

  ~~~
~~~

buildToolsVersion = "33.0.1"

compileSdkVersion 33

sudo npm install n -g

# 下载最新稳定版

sudo n stable

# 下载最新版

sudo n lastest

# 查看已下载的版本

sudo n ls

# 切换 Node 版本

sudo n 18.21.1

  ~~~



# 安装React Native命令行界面。

|| appProject?.ext?.react?.enableHermes?.toBoolean()


  ~~~

npm install --legacy-peer-deps 解决安装问题

npm install -g react-native-cli

npm uninstall -g react-native-cli @react-native-community/cli

  
  


cd AwesomeProject

react-native run-ios

  


npm install redux // 生产环境的依赖

npm install redux -dev // 开发环境的依赖

npm uninstall redux

  
  
  ~~~

  ~~~

$ cd android

$ ./gradlew assembleRelease

// 实例化 metro Server启动 metro 构建 bundle处理资源文件

commandLine(*execCommand, bundleCommand, "--platform", "android", "--dev", "${devEnabled}",

"--reset-cache", "--entry-file", entryFile, "--bundle-output", jsBundleFile, "--assets-dest", resourcesDir,

"--sourcemap-output", enableHermes ? jsPackagerSourceMapFile : jsOutputSourceMapFile, *extraArgs)

ios打包：

npx react-native run-ios --configuration Release

shellScript = "export NODE_BINARY=node\n#export FORCE_BUNDLING=true\nexport BUNDLE_COMMAND=bundle\n../node_modules/react-native/scripts/react-native-xcode.sh\n";

  
  


https://gitee.com/nuogui/AndrCodeRepository.git

  


ps -ef | grep wechat | cut -c 11-16 | xargs sudo kill -9

  


ps -ef | grep -v wechat | cut -c 12-18

  
  ~~~


# 安装闹钟

- Find Pomodoro in Software Center or run


~~~
#git clone -b gnome-41 https://github.com/gnome-pomodoro/gnome-pomodoro.git

sudo apt-get install gnome-shell-pomodo

安装命令 sudo dpkg -i 文件名.deb

启动命令 /usr/local/sunlogin/bin/sunloginclient

卸载命令 sudo dpkg -r sunloginclient

  ~~~
  
  
~~~
uname -v

lsb_release -a


http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu xenial InRelease: 由于没有公钥，无法验证下列签名： NO_PUBKEY 40976EAF437D05B5 NO_PUBKEY 3B4FE6ACC0B21F32



sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 40976EAF437D05B5

sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 3B4FE6ACC0B21F32

  
~~~
  

~~~

1.查看安装的所有软件

例如：dpkg -l | grep ftp

  


2.查看软件安装的路径

dpkg -L | grep ftp

也可以用 whereis ftp

  


3.查看软件版本

aptitude show xxx

  


安装应用时使用

apt-get install

卸载应用时使用

sudo apt remove program_name

完全卸载应用

sudo apt purge program_name

如果不知道具体的应用名称或者开头字母，你可以 列出 Ubuntu 中所有已安装的包

apt list --installed | grep -i xxx

  


snap list

  


nano

字符终端文本编辑器

sudo nano /etc/pam.d/common-password

使用Ctrl+O来保存所做的修改 退出 按Ctrl+X

root密码：52101985zzMzzM*

~~~css

~~~

## NDK添加如下信息

~~~NDK
export NDKROOT=/ndk解压目录/android-ndk-r21
export PATH=$NDKROOT:$PATH
~~~

  
## CMAKETEXT添加如下信息
~~~NDK
cmake -S . -B build

cmake --build build



cmake -S . -B build -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

cmake --build build

app.thread.scheduleLaunchActivity


add_executable()

add_library() 命令支持可选的三个互斥参数：STATIC | SHARED | MODULE

cmake -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

~~~

  


## 如何在Linux下安装cmake

~~~

sudo apt-get install cmake

  
  


如果没有安装g++,gcc,gdb，输入以下命令进行安装

sudo apt-get install build-essential

sudo apt install gdb
~~~
  
  


## 制作android系统线程方法

adb push out/target/product/generic_x86/system/bin /data/local/

./android_thread



  


man abort

stdlib.h

~~~
  


the IDE is running low on memory

|| appProject?.ext?.react?.enableHermes?.toBoolean()

react-native run-ios

# 实际开发中常用的Linux命令和Android 指令

  
~~~css
- vim ~/.bashrc
~~~

## NDK添加如下信息

~~~NDK
export NDKROOT=/ndk解压目录/android-ndk-r21
export PATH=$NDKROOT:$PATH
~~~

  
## CMAKETEXT添加如下信息
~~~NDK
cmake -S . -B build

cmake --build build



cmake -S . -B build -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

cmake --build build

app.thread.scheduleLaunchActivity


add_executable()

add_library() 命令支持可选的三个互斥参数：STATIC | SHARED | MODULE

cmake -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

~~~

  


## 如何在Linux下安装cmake

~~~

sudo apt-get install cmake

  
  


如果没有安装g++,gcc,gdb，输入以下命令进行安装

sudo apt-get install build-essential

sudo apt install gdb
~~~
  
  


## 制作android系统线程方法

- 放在根目录，然后make xxx目标（去mk中看
~~~

adb push out/target/product/generic_x86/system/bin /data/local/

./android_thread



  


man abort

stdlib.h

~~~
  


the IDE is running low on memory

## 日志打印技巧：
~~~

adb shell

logcat -b all | grep hello

Log.i(TAG,"message",new Exception())

全局搜索字符串 grep "\.handleMeassage" ./ -rn

adb shell dumpsys activity activities

  
~~~



# 升级 npm
~~~

sudo apt update

sudo apt install nodejs

#不自带 npm 需要自行安装

sudo apt install npm


sudo npm install npm -g

  ~~~
  
  
~~~

//install compare software

https://www.scootersoftware.com/support.php?zz=kb_linux_install

  ~~~
~~~

buildToolsVersion = "33.0.1"

compileSdkVersion 33

sudo npm install n -g

# 下载最新稳定版

sudo n stable

# 下载最新版

sudo n lastest

# 查看已下载的版本

sudo n ls

# 切换 Node 版本

sudo n 18.21.1

  ~~~



# 安装React Native命令行界面。

|| appProject?.ext?.react?.enableHermes?.toBoolean()


  ~~~

npm install --legacy-peer-deps 解决安装问题

npm install -g react-native-cli

npm uninstall -g react-native-cli @react-native-community/cli

  
  


cd AwesomeProject

react-native run-ios

  


npm install redux // 生产环境的依赖

npm install redux -dev // 开发环境的依赖

npm uninstall redux

  
  
  ~~~

  ~~~

$ cd android

$ ./gradlew assembleRelease

// 实例化 metro Server启动 metro 构建 bundle处理资源文件

commandLine(*execCommand, bundleCommand, "--platform", "android", "--dev", "${devEnabled}",

"--reset-cache", "--entry-file", entryFile, "--bundle-output", jsBundleFile, "--assets-dest", resourcesDir,

"--sourcemap-output", enableHermes ? jsPackagerSourceMapFile : jsOutputSourceMapFile, *extraArgs)

ios打包：

npx react-native run-ios --configuration Release

shellScript = "export NODE_BINARY=node\n#export FORCE_BUNDLING=true\nexport BUNDLE_COMMAND=bundle\n../node_modules/react-native/scripts/react-native-xcode.sh\n";

  
  


https://gitee.com/nuogui/AndrCodeRepository.git

  


ps -ef | grep wechat | cut -c 11-16 | xargs sudo kill -9

  


ps -ef | grep -v wechat | cut -c 12-18

  
  ~~~


# 安装闹钟

- Find Pomodoro in Software Center or run


~~~
#git clone -b gnome-41 https://github.com/gnome-pomodoro/gnome-pomodoro.git

sudo apt-get install gnome-shell-pomodo

安装命令 sudo dpkg -i 文件名.deb

启动命令 /usr/local/sunlogin/bin/sunloginclient

卸载命令 sudo dpkg -r sunloginclient

  ~~~
  
  
~~~
uname -v

lsb_release -a


http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu xenial InRelease: 由于没有公钥，无法验证下列签名： NO_PUBKEY 40976EAF437D05B5 NO_PUBKEY 3B4FE6ACC0B21F32



sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 40976EAF437D05B5

sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 3B4FE6ACC0B21F32

  
~~~
  

~~~

1.查看安装的所有软件

dpkg -l

例如：dpkg -l | grep ftp

  


2.查看软件安装的路径

dpkg -L | grep ftp

也可以用 whereis ftp

  


3.查看软件版本

aptitude show xxx

  


安装应用时使用

apt-get install

卸载应用时使用

sudo apt remove program_name

完全卸载应用

sudo apt purge program_name

如果不知道具体的应用名称或者开头字母，你可以 列出 Ubuntu 中所有已安装的包

apt list --installed | grep -i xxx

  


snap list

  


nano

字符终端文本编辑器

sudo nano /etc/pam.d/common-password

使用Ctrl+O来保存所做的修改 退出 按Ctrl+X

  


sudo passwd root 给root用户修改密码

su root 切换用户

  


root密码：52101985zzMzzM*

  
~~~


repo安装

sudo apt install repo

  


git config --global user.email "teitibou@163.com"

git config --global user.name "teitibou"

  
  


sudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list //在行尾添加如下两行的内容

deb http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ xenial main universe

deb-src http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ xenial main universe

  


cat /proc/cpuinfo来查看相关的cpu信息

lsb_release -a，查看发行版本信息，并且方法可以适用于所有的Linux发行版本。

  


cat /etc/issue可以查看到当前是Linux什么版本系统。

cat /proc/version可以查看内核的版本号。

  


which java 查找java

ls -lrt /usr/bin/java 查找文件快捷链接原地址

ln -s /usr/local/jvm/jdk1.8.0_303/ /usr/jdk 创建一个软连接

  


/usr/lib/jvm/java-11-openjdk-amd64/bin/java

  


du -sh ./folder ubuntu 查看文件夹大小

/usr/lib/jvm/java-11-openjdk-amd64

  


// 打开/etc/apt/sources.list

sudo nano /etc/apt/sources.list

//在最后粘贴以下两行

deb http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ xenial main universe

deb-src http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ xenial main universe

//ctrl +s 保存，ctrl + x退出

//在terminal执行

sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install libesd0-dev

  
  


工作有意义，生活有品质 git 操作operator

sanyusily.github.io/mdbook_site

  


$ git remote add origin https://github.com/sanyusily/sanyusily.github.io.git

$ git remote add origin git@github.com:sanyusily/sanyusily.github.io.git

  


$ git stash

$ git pull --rebase origin master

# change to your github repo

$ git stash pop

$ git rebase --continue

  


$ git branch -M develop

$ git push -u origin develop

  


mkdir quickstart-react-native

cd quickstart-react-native

git init

touch README.md

git add README.md

git commit -m "first commit"

git remote add origin https://gitee.com/sanyusily/quickstart-react-native.git

git push -u origin "master"

  
  
  


git branch --set-upstream-to=origin/master master

因为远程仓库新建时，有LIENCE，由于本地仓库和远程仓库有不同的开始点，也就是两个仓库没有共同的commit出现，无法提交，此时我们需要allow-unrelated-histories。也就是我们的 pull 命令改为下面这样的：

git pull origin master --allow-unrelated-histories

  


git remote -v

git remote add 仓库地址

git remote rm 仓库名称

  


$ ssh-keygen -t rsa

$ cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub

  


$ code . 打开vscode

  


解决git每次提交代码都要输入帐号密码

git config --global credential.helper store

  
  


github.com/oh-my-docker/jekyll-docker

  


$ sudo apt install docker.io

  
  
  


$ sudo apt-get install ruby ruby-dev 安装Ruby包和开发工具：

$ sudo apt-get install make build-essential 必需的构建工具

$ sudo gem install bundler 依赖包安装

$ sudo gem install jekyll

bundle exec jekyll -v

bundle exec jekyll serve

  


卸载重新安装jekyll

PACKAGES="$(dpkg -l |grep jekyll|cut -d" " -f3|xargs )"

sudo apt remove --purge $PACKAGES

sudo apt autoremove

sudo gem install jekyll jekyll-feed jekyll-gist jekyll-paginate jekyll-sass-converter jekyll-coffeescript

bundle update

  


bundle exec jekyll new myblog

bundle exec jekyll serve

  
  
  
  


https://github.com/oh-my-docker/jekyll-docker

  


docker pull quay.io/jetstack/cert-manager-cainjector:v0.12.0

docker pull quay-mirror.qiniu.com/jetstack/cert-manager-cainjector:v0.12.0

  


docker pull quay-mirror.qiniu.com/omd/jekyll

$ docker pull quay.io/omd/jekyll

$ docker pull quay-mirror.qiniu.com/omd/jekyll

# 实际开发中常用的Linux命令和Android 指令

  
~~~css
- vim ~/.bashrc
~~~

## NDK添加如下信息

~~~NDK
export NDKROOT=/ndk解压目录/android-ndk-r21
export PATH=$NDKROOT:$PATH
~~~

  
## CMAKETEXT添加如下信息
~~~NDK
cmake -S . -B build

cmake --build build



cmake -S . -B build -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

cmake --build build

app.thread.scheduleLaunchActivity


add_executable()

add_library() 命令支持可选的三个互斥参数：STATIC | SHARED | MODULE

cmake -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

~~~

  


## 如何在Linux下安装cmake

~~~

sudo apt-get install cmake

  
  


如果没有安装g++,gcc,gdb，输入以下命令进行安装

sudo apt-get install build-essential

sudo apt install gdb
~~~
  
  


## 制作android系统线程方法

- 放在根目录，然后make xxx目标（去mk中看
~~~

adb push out/target/product/generic_x86/system/bin /data/local/

./android_thread



  


man abort

stdlib.h

~~~
  


the IDE is running low on memory

## 日志打印技巧：
~~~

adb shell

logcat -b all | grep hello

Log.i(TAG,"message",new Exception())

全局搜索字符串 grep "\.handleMeassage" ./ -rn

adb shell dumpsys activity activities

  
~~~



# 升级 npm
~~~

sudo apt update

sudo apt install nodejs

#不自带 npm 需要自行安装

sudo apt install npm


sudo npm install npm -g

  ~~~
  
  
~~~

//install compare software

https://www.scootersoftware.com/support.php?zz=kb_linux_install

  ~~~
~~~

buildToolsVersion = "33.0.1"

compileSdkVersion 33

sudo npm install n -g

# 下载最新稳定版

sudo n stable

# 下载最新版

sudo n lastest

# 查看已下载的版本

sudo n ls

# 切换 Node 版本

sudo n 18.21.1

  ~~~



# 安装React Native命令行界面。

|| appProject?.ext?.react?.enableHermes?.toBoolean()


  ~~~

npm install --legacy-peer-deps 解决安装问题

npm install -g react-native-cli

npm uninstall -g react-native-cli @react-native-community/cli

  
  


cd AwesomeProject

react-native run-ios

  


npm install redux // 生产环境的依赖

npm install redux -dev // 开发环境的依赖

npm uninstall redux

  
  
  ~~~

  ~~~

$ cd android

$ ./gradlew assembleRelease

// 实例化 metro Server启动 metro 构建 bundle处理资源文件

commandLine(*execCommand, bundleCommand, "--platform", "android", "--dev", "${devEnabled}",

"--reset-cache", "--entry-file", entryFile, "--bundle-output", jsBundleFile, "--assets-dest", resourcesDir,

sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 3B4FE6ACC0B21F32

apt-get install

卸载应用时使用

sudo apt remove program_name

sudo apt purge program_name

apt list --installed | grep -i xxx

  


snap list

  


nano

# 实际开发中常用的Linux命令和Android 指令

  
~~~css

~~~

## NDK添加如下信息

~~~NDK
export NDKROOT=/ndk解压目录/android-ndk-r21
export PATH=$NDKROOT:$PATH
~~~

  
## CMAKETEXT添加如下信息
~~~NDK
cmake -S . -B build

cmake --build build



cmake -S . -B build -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

cmake --build build

app.thread.scheduleLaunchActivity


add_executable()

add_library() 命令支持可选的三个互斥参数：STATIC | SHARED | MODULE

cmake -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

~~~

  


## 如何在Linux下安装cmake

~~~

sudo apt-get install cmake

  
  


如果没有安装g++,gcc,gdb，输入以下命令进行安装

sudo apt-get install build-essential

sudo apt install gdb
~~~
  
  


## 制作android系统线程方法

- 放在根目录，然后make xxx目标（去mk中看
~~~

adb push out/target/product/generic_x86/system/bin /data/local/

./android_thread



  


man abort

stdlib.h

~~~
  


the IDE is running low on memory

## 日志打印技巧：
~~~

adb shell

logcat -b all | grep hello

全局搜索字符串 grep "\.handleMeassage" ./ -rn

~~~



# 升级 npm
~~~

sudo apt update

sudo apt install nodejs

sudo npm install npm -g

~~~

//install compare software

sudo n lastest

|| appProject?.ext?.react?.enableHermes?.toBoolean()


  ~~~

npm install --legacy-peer-deps 解决安装问题

npm uninstall -g react-native-cli @react-native-community/cli

  
  


cd AwesomeProject

react-native run-ios

npm install redux -dev // 开发环境的依赖

npm uninstall redux

  
  
  ~~~

  ~~~

$ ./gradlew assembleRelease

// 实例化 metro Server启动 metro 构建 bundle处理资源文件

~~~
#git clone -b gnome-41 https://github.com/gnome-pomodoro/gnome-pomodoro.git

sudo apt-get install gnome-shell-pomodo

安装命令 sudo dpkg -i 文件名.deb

启动命令 /usr/local/sunlogin/bin/sunloginclient

卸载命令 sudo dpkg -r sunloginclient

  ~~~
  
  
~~~
uname -v

lsb_release -a


http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu xenial InRelease: 由于没有公钥，无法验证下列签名： NO_PUBKEY 40976EAF437D05B5 NO_PUBKEY 3B4FE6ACC0B21F32



sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 40976EAF437D05B5

sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 3B4FE6ACC0B21F32

  
~~~
  

~~~

1.查看安装的所有软件

dpkg -l

例如：dpkg -l | grep ftp

  


2.查看软件安装的路径

dpkg -L | grep ftp

也可以用 whereis ftp

  


3.查看软件版本

aptitude show xxx

  


安装应用时使用

apt-get install

卸载应用时使用

sudo apt remove program_name

完全卸载应用

sudo apt purge program_name

如果不知道具体的应用名称或者开头字母，你可以 列出 Ubuntu 中所有已安装的包

apt list --installed | grep -i xxx

  


snap list

  


nano

字符终端文本编辑器

sudo nano /etc/pam.d/common-password

使用Ctrl+O来保存所做的修改 退出 按Ctrl+X

  


sudo passwd root 给root用户修改密码

su root 切换用户

  


root密码：52101985zzMzzM*

  
~~~


repo安装

sudo apt install repo

  


git config --global user.email "teitibou@163.com"

git config --global user.name "teitibou"

  
  


sudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list //在行尾添加如下两行的内容

deb http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ xenial main universe

deb-src http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ xenial main universe

  


cat /proc/cpuinfo来查看相关的cpu信息

lsb_release -a，查看发行版本信息，并且方法可以适用于所有的Linux发行版本。

  


cat /etc/issue可以查看到当前是Linux什么版本系统。

cat /proc/version可以查看内核的版本号。

  


which java 查找java

ls -lrt /usr/bin/java 查找文件快捷链接原地址

ln -s /usr/local/jvm/jdk1.8.0_303/ /usr/jdk 创建一个软连接

  


/usr/lib/jvm/java-11-openjdk-amd64/bin/java

  


du -sh ./folder ubuntu 查看文件夹大小

/usr/lib/jvm/java-11-openjdk-amd64

  


// 打开/etc/apt/sources.list

sudo nano /etc/apt/sources.list

//在最后粘贴以下两行

deb http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ xenial main universe

deb-src http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ xenial main universe

//ctrl +s 保存，ctrl + x退出

//在terminal执行

sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install libesd0-dev

  
  


工作有意义，生活有品质 git 操作operator

sanyusily.github.io/mdbook_site

  


$ git remote add origin https://github.com/sanyusily/sanyusily.github.io.git

$ git remote add origin git@github.com:sanyusily/sanyusily.github.io.git

  


$ git stash

$ git pull --rebase origin master

# change to your github repo

$ git stash pop

$ git rebase --continue

  


$ git branch -M develop

$ git push -u origin develop

  


mkdir quickstart-react-native

cd quickstart-react-native

git init

touch README.md

git add README.md

git commit -m "first commit"

git remote add origin https://gitee.com/sanyusily/quickstart-react-native.git

git push -u origin "master"

  
  
  


git branch --set-upstream-to=origin/master master

因为远程仓库新建时，有LIENCE，由于本地仓库和远程仓库有不同的开始点，也就是两个仓库没有共同的commit出现，无法提交，此时我们需要allow-unrelated-histories。也就是我们的 pull 命令改为下面这样的：

git pull origin master --allow-unrelated-histories

  


git remote -v

git remote add 仓库地址

git remote rm 仓库名称

  


$ ssh-keygen -t rsa

$ cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub

  


$ code . 打开vscode

  


解决git每次提交代码都要输入帐号密码

git config --global credential.helper store

  
  


github.com/oh-my-docker/jekyll-docker

  


$ sudo apt install docker.io

  
  
  


$ sudo apt-get install ruby ruby-dev 安装Ruby包和开发工具：

$ sudo apt-get install make build-essential 必需的构建工具

$ sudo gem install bundler 依赖包安装

$ sudo gem install jekyll

bundle exec jekyll -v

bundle exec jekyll serve

  


卸载重新安装jekyll

PACKAGES="$(dpkg -l |grep jekyll|cut -d" " -f3|xargs )"

sudo apt remove --purge $PACKAGES

sudo apt autoremove

sudo gem install jekyll jekyll-feed jekyll-gist jekyll-paginate jekyll-sass-converter jekyll-coffeescript

bundle update

  


bundle exec jekyll new myblog

bundle exec jekyll serve

  
  
  
  


https://github.com/oh-my-docker/jekyll-docker

  


docker pull quay.io/jetstack/cert-manager-cainjector:v0.12.0

docker pull quay-mirror.qiniu.com/jetstack/cert-manager-cainjector:v0.12.0

  


docker pull quay-mirror.qiniu.com/omd/jekyll

$ docker pull quay.io/omd/jekyll

$ docker pull quay-mirror.qiniu.com/omd/jekyll

~~~css
- vim ~/.bashrc
~~~

## NDK添加如下信息

~~~NDK
export NDKROOT=/ndk解压目录/android-ndk-r21
export PATH=$NDKROOT:$PATH
~~~

  
## CMAKETEXT添加如下信息
~~~NDK
cmake -S . -B build

cmake --build build



cmake -S . -B build -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

cmake --build build

app.thread.scheduleLaunchActivity


add_executable()

add_library() 命令支持可选的三个互斥参数：STATIC | SHARED | MODULE

cmake -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

~~~

~~~

sudo apt-get install cmake

  
  


如果没有安装g++,gcc,gdb，输入以下命令进行安装

sudo apt-get install build-essential

sudo apt install gdb
~~~

man abort

stdlib.h

# 实际开发中常用的Linux命令和Android 指令

  
~~~css
- vim ~/.bashrc
~~~

## NDK添加如下信息

~~~NDK
export NDKROOT=/ndk解压目录/android-ndk-r21
export PATH=$NDKROOT:$PATH
~~~

  
## CMAKETEXT添加如下信息
~~~NDK
cmake -S . -B build

cmake --build build



cmake -S . -B build -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

cmake --build build

app.thread.scheduleLaunchActivity


add_executable()

add_library() 命令支持可选的三个互斥参数：STATIC | SHARED | MODULE

cmake -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

~~~

  


## 如何在Linux下安装cmake

~~~

sudo apt-get install cmake

  
  


如果没有安装g++,gcc,gdb，输入以下命令进行安装

sudo apt-get install build-essential

sudo apt install gdb
~~~
  
  


## 制作android系统线程方法

- 放在根目录，然后make xxx目标（去mk中看
~~~

adb push out/target/product/generic_x86/system/bin /data/local/

./android_thread



  


man abort

stdlib.h

~~~
  


the IDE is running low on memory

## 日志打印技巧：
~~~

adb shell

logcat -b all | grep hello

Log.i(TAG,"message",new Exception())

全局搜索字符串 grep "\.handleMeassage" ./ -rn

adb shell dumpsys activity activities

  
~~~



# 升级 npm
~~~

sudo apt update

sudo apt install nodejs

#不自带 npm 需要自行安装

sudo apt install npm


sudo npm install npm -g

  ~~~
  
  
~~~

//install compare software

https://www.scootersoftware.com/support.php?zz=kb_linux_install

  ~~~
~~~

buildToolsVersion = "33.0.1"

compileSdkVersion 33

sudo npm install n -g

# 下载最新稳定版

sudo n stable

# 下载最新版

sudo n lastest

# 查看已下载的版本

sudo n ls

# 切换 Node 版本

sudo n 18.21.1

  ~~~



# 安装React Native命令行界面。

|| appProject?.ext?.react?.enableHermes?.toBoolean()


  ~~~

npm install --legacy-peer-deps 解决安装问题

npm install -g react-native-cli

npm uninstall -g react-native-cli @react-native-community/cli

  
  


cd AwesomeProject

react-native run-ios

  


npm install redux // 生产环境的依赖

npm install redux -dev // 开发环境的依赖

npm uninstall redux

  
  
  ~~~

  ~~~

$ cd android

$ ./gradlew assembleRelease

// 实例化 metro Server启动 metro 构建 bundle处理资源文件

commandLine(*execCommand, bundleCommand, "--platform", "android", "--dev", "${devEnabled}",

"--reset-cache", "--entry-file", entryFile, "--bundle-output", jsBundleFile, "--assets-dest", resourcesDir,

"--sourcemap-output", enableHermes ? jsPackagerSourceMapFile : jsOutputSourceMapFile, *extraArgs)

npx react-native run-ios --configuration Release

https://gitee.com/nuogui/AndrCodeRepository.git

  


ps -ef | grep wechat | cut -c 11-16 | xargs sudo kill -9

  


ps -ef | grep -v wechat | cut -c 12-18

  
  ~~~

sudo apt-get install gnome-shell-pomodo

安装命令 sudo dpkg -i 文件名.deb

启动命令 /usr/local/sunlogin/bin/sunloginclient

卸载命令 sudo dpkg -r sunloginclient

  ~~~

uname -v

lsb_release -a


http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu xenial InRelease: 由于没有公钥，无法验证下列签名： NO_PUBKEY 40976EAF437D05B5 NO_PUBKEY 3B4FE6ACC0B21F32



sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 40976EAF437D05B5

sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 3B4FE6ACC0B21F32

3.查看软件版本

安装应用时使用

apt-get install

卸载应用时使用

sudo apt remove program_name

sudo apt purge program_name

如果不知道具体的应用名称或者开头字母，你可以 列出 Ubuntu 中所有已安装的包

apt list --installed | grep -i xxx

  


snap list

  


nano

字符终端文本编辑器

sudo nano /etc/pam.d/common-password

使用Ctrl+O来保存所做的修改 退出 按Ctrl+X

root密码：52101985zzMzzM*

  
~~~

/usr/lib/jvm/java-11-openjdk-amd64/bin/java

  


du -sh ./folder ubuntu 查看文件夹大小

# 实际开发中常用的Linux命令和Android 指令

  
~~~css
- vim ~/.bashrc
~~~

## NDK添加如下信息

~~~NDK
export NDKROOT=/ndk解压目录/android-ndk-r21
export PATH=$NDKROOT:$PATH
~~~

  
## CMAKETEXT添加如下信息
~~~NDK
cmake -S . -B build

cmake --build build



cmake -S . -B build -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

cmake --build build

app.thread.scheduleLaunchActivity


add_executable()

add_library() 命令支持可选的三个互斥参数：STATIC | SHARED | MODULE

cmake -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

~~~

  


## 如何在Linux下安装cmake

~~~

sudo apt-get install cmake

  
  


如果没有安装g++,gcc,gdb，输入以下命令进行安装

sudo apt-get install build-essential

sudo apt install gdb
~~~
  
  


## 制作android系统线程方法

- 放在根目录，然后make xxx目标（去mk中看
~~~

adb push out/target/product/generic_x86/system/bin /data/local/

./android_thread



  


man abort

stdlib.h

~~~
  


the IDE is running low on memory

## 日志打印技巧：
~~~

adb shell

logcat -b all | grep hello

Log.i(TAG,"message",new Exception())

全局搜索字符串 grep "\.handleMeassage" ./ -rn

adb shell dumpsys activity activities

  
~~~



# 升级 npm
~~~

sudo apt update

sudo apt install nodejs

#不自带 npm 需要自行安装

sudo apt install npm


sudo npm install npm -g

  ~~~
  
  
~~~

//install compare software

https://www.scootersoftware.com/support.php?zz=kb_linux_install

  ~~~
~~~

buildToolsVersion = "33.0.1"

compileSdkVersion 33

sudo npm install n -g

# 下载最新稳定版

sudo n stable

# 下载最新版

sudo n lastest

# 查看已下载的版本

sudo n ls

# 切换 Node 版本

sudo n 18.21.1

  ~~~



# 安装React Native命令行界面。

|| appProject?.ext?.react?.enableHermes?.toBoolean()


  ~~~

npm install --legacy-peer-deps 解决安装问题

npm install -g react-native-cli

npm uninstall -g react-native-cli @react-native-community/cli

  
  


cd AwesomeProject

react-native run-ios

  


npm install redux // 生产环境的依赖

npm install redux -dev // 开发环境的依赖

npm uninstall redux

  
  
  ~~~

  ~~~

$ cd android

$ ./gradlew assembleRelease

// 实例化 metro Server启动 metro 构建 bundle处理资源文件

commandLine(*execCommand, bundleCommand, "--platform", "android", "--dev", "${devEnabled}",

"--reset-cache", "--entry-file", entryFile, "--bundle-output", jsBundleFile, "--assets-dest", resourcesDir,

"--sourcemap-output", enableHermes ? jsPackagerSourceMapFile : jsOutputSourceMapFile, *extraArgs)

ios打包：

npx react-native run-ios --configuration Release

shellScript = "export NODE_BINARY=node\n#export FORCE_BUNDLING=true\nexport BUNDLE_COMMAND=bundle\n../node_modules/react-native/scripts/react-native-xcode.sh\n";

  
  


https://gitee.com/nuogui/AndrCodeRepository.git

  


ps -ef | grep wechat | cut -c 11-16 | xargs sudo kill -9

  


ps -ef | grep -v wechat | cut -c 12-18

  
  ~~~


# 安装闹钟

- Find Pomodoro in Software Center or run


~~~
#git clone -b gnome-41 https://github.com/gnome-pomodoro/gnome-pomodoro.git

sudo apt-get install gnome-shell-pomodo

安装命令 sudo dpkg -i 文件名.deb

启动命令 /usr/local/sunlogin/bin/sunloginclient

卸载命令 sudo dpkg -r sunloginclient

  ~~~
  
  
~~~
uname -v

lsb_release -a


http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu xenial InRelease: 由于没有公钥，无法验证下列签名： NO_PUBKEY 40976EAF437D05B5 NO_PUBKEY 3B4FE6ACC0B21F32



sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 40976EAF437D05B5

sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 3B4FE6ACC0B21F32

  
~~~
  

~~~

1.查看安装的所有软件

dpkg -l

例如：dpkg -l | grep ftp

  


2.查看软件安装的路径

dpkg -L | grep ftp

也可以用 whereis ftp

  


3.查看软件版本

aptitude show xxx

  


安装应用时使用

apt-get install

卸载应用时使用

sudo apt remove program_name

完全卸载应用

sudo apt purge program_name

如果不知道具体的应用名称或者开头字母，你可以 列出 Ubuntu 中所有已安装的包

apt list --installed | grep -i xxx

  


snap list

  


nano

字符终端文本编辑器

sudo nano /etc/pam.d/common-password

使用Ctrl+O来保存所做的修改 退出 按Ctrl+X

  


sudo passwd root 给root用户修改密码

su root 切换用户

  


root密码：52101985zzMzzM*

  
~~~


repo安装

sudo apt install repo

  


git config --global user.email "teitibou@163.com"

git config --global user.name "teitibou"

  
  


sudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list //在行尾添加如下两行的内容

deb http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ xenial main universe

deb-src http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ xenial main universe

  


cat /proc/cpuinfo来查看相关的cpu信息

lsb_release -a，查看发行版本信息，并且方法可以适用于所有的Linux发行版本。

  


cat /etc/issue可以查看到当前是Linux什么版本系统。

cat /proc/version可以查看内核的版本号。

  


which java 查找java

ls -lrt /usr/bin/java 查找文件快捷链接原地址

ln -s /usr/local/jvm/jdk1.8.0_303/ /usr/jdk 创建一个软连接

  


/usr/lib/jvm/java-11-openjdk-amd64/bin/java

  


du -sh ./folder ubuntu 查看文件夹大小

/usr/lib/jvm/java-11-openjdk-amd64

  


// 打开/etc/apt/sources.list

sudo nano /etc/apt/sources.list

//在最后粘贴以下两行

deb http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ xenial main universe

deb-src http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ xenial main universe

//ctrl +s 保存，ctrl + x退出

//在terminal执行

sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install libesd0-dev

  
  


工作有意义，生活有品质 git 操作operator

sanyusily.github.io/mdbook_site

  


$ git remote add origin https://github.com/sanyusily/sanyusily.github.io.git

$ git remote add origin git@github.com:sanyusily/sanyusily.github.io.git

  


$ git stash

$ git pull --rebase origin master

# change to your github repo

$ git stash pop

$ git rebase --continue

  


$ git branch -M develop

$ git push -u origin develop

  


mkdir quickstart-react-native

cd quickstart-react-native

git init

touch README.md

git add README.md

git commit -m "first commit"

git remote add origin https://gitee.com/sanyusily/quickstart-react-native.git

git push -u origin "master"

  
  
  


git branch --set-upstream-to=origin/master master

因为远程仓库新建时，有LIENCE，由于本地仓库和远程仓库有不同的开始点，也就是两个仓库没有共同的commit出现，无法提交，此时我们需要allow-unrelated-histories。也就是我们的 pull 命令改为下面这样的：

git pull origin master --allow-unrelated-histories

  


git remote -v

git remote add 仓库地址

git remote rm 仓库名称

  


$ ssh-keygen -t rsa

$ cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub

  


$ code . 打开vscode

  


解决git每次提交代码都要输入帐号密码

git config --global credential.helper store

  
  


github.com/oh-my-docker/jekyll-docker

  


$ sudo apt install docker.io

  
  
  


$ sudo apt-get install ruby ruby-dev 安装Ruby包和开发工具：

$ sudo apt-get install make build-essential 必需的构建工具

$ sudo gem install bundler 依赖包安装

$ sudo gem install jekyll

bundle exec jekyll -v

bundle exec jekyll serve

  


卸载重新安装jekyll

PACKAGES="$(dpkg -l |grep jekyll|cut -d" " -f3|xargs )"

sudo apt remove --purge $PACKAGES

sudo apt autoremove

sudo gem install jekyll jekyll-feed jekyll-gist jekyll-paginate jekyll-sass-converter jekyll-coffeescript

bundle update

  


bundle exec jekyll new myblog

bundle exec jekyll serve

  
  
  
  


https://github.com/oh-my-docker/jekyll-docker

  


docker pull quay.io/jetstack/cert-manager-cainjector:v0.12.0

docker pull quay-mirror.qiniu.com/jetstack/cert-manager-cainjector:v0.12.0

  


docker pull quay-mirror.qiniu.com/omd/jekyll

$ docker pull quay.io/omd/jekyll

$ docker pull quay-mirror.qiniu.com/omd/jekyll

dpkg -L | grep ftp

也可以用 whereis ftp

  


3.查看软件版本

aptitude show xxx

  


安装应用时使用

apt-get install

卸载应用时使用

sudo apt remove program_name

完全卸载应用

sudo apt purge program_name

如果不知道具体的应用名称或者开头字母，你可以 列出 Ubuntu 中所有已安装的包

apt list --installed | grep -i xxx

  


snap list

  


nano

字符终端文本编辑器

sudo nano /etc/pam.d/common-password

使用Ctrl+O来保存所做的修改 退出 按Ctrl+X

  


sudo passwd root 给root用户修改密码

su root 切换用户

  


root密码：52101985zzMzzM*

deb-src http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ xenial main universe

  


cat /proc/cpuinfo来查看相关的cpu信息

sudo apt-get install cmake

  
  


如果没有安装g++,gcc,gdb，输入以下命令进行安装

sudo apt-get install build-essential

sudo apt install gdb
~~~
  
  


## 制作android系统线程方法

- 放在根目录，然后make xxx目标（去mk中看
~~~

adb push out/target/product/generic_x86/system/bin /data/local/

./android_thread



  


man abort

stdlib.h

~~~
  


the IDE is running low on memory

## 日志打印技巧：
~~~

adb shell

logcat -b all | grep hello

Log.i(TAG,"message",new Exception())

全局搜索字符串 grep "\.handleMeassage" ./ -rn

adb shell dumpsys activity activities

  
~~~



# 升级 npm
~~~

sudo apt update

sudo apt install nodejs

#不自带 npm 需要自行安装

sudo apt install npm


sudo npm install npm -g

  ~~~
  
  
~~~

//install compare software

https://www.scootersoftware.com/support.php?zz=kb_linux_install

  ~~~
~~~

buildToolsVersion = "33.0.1"

compileSdkVersion 33

sudo npm install n -g

# 下载最新稳定版

sudo n stable

# 下载最新版

sudo n lastest

# 查看已下载的版本

sudo n ls

# 切换 Node 版本

sudo n 18.21.1

  ~~~



# 安装React Native命令行界面。

|| appProject?.ext?.react?.enableHermes?.toBoolean()


  ~~~

npm install --legacy-peer-deps 解决安装问题

npm install -g react-native-cli

npm uninstall -g react-native-cli @react-native-community/cli

  
  


cd AwesomeProject

react-native run-ios

  


npm install redux // 生产环境的依赖

npm install redux -dev // 开发环境的依赖

npm uninstall redux

  
  
  ~~~

  ~~~

$ cd android

$ ./gradlew assembleRelease

// 实例化 metro Server启动 metro 构建 bundle处理资源文件

commandLine(*execCommand, bundleCommand, "--platform", "android", "--dev", "${devEnabled}",

"--reset-cache", "--entry-file", entryFile, "--bundle-output", jsBundleFile, "--assets-dest", resourcesDir,

"--sourcemap-output", enableHermes ? jsPackagerSourceMapFile : jsOutputSourceMapFile, *extraArgs)

ios打包：

npx react-native run-ios --configuration Release

shellScript = "export NODE_BINARY=node\n#export FORCE_BUNDLING=true\nexport BUNDLE_COMMAND=bundle\n../node_modules/react-native/scripts/react-native-xcode.sh\n";

  
  


https://gitee.com/nuogui/AndrCodeRepository.git

  


ps -ef | grep wechat | cut -c 11-16 | xargs sudo kill -9

# 安装闹钟

- Find Pomodoro in Software Center or run


~~~
#git clone -b gnome-41 https://github.com/gnome-pomodoro/gnome-pomodoro.git

sudo apt-get install gnome-shell-pomodo

安装命令 sudo dpkg -i 文件名.deb

启动命令 /usr/local/sunlogin/bin/sunloginclient

卸载命令 sudo dpkg -r sunloginclient

  ~~~
  
  
~~~
uname -v

lsb_release -a


http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu xenial InRelease: 由于没有公钥，无法验证下列签名： NO_PUBKEY 40976EAF437D05B5 NO_PUBKEY 3B4FE6ACC0B21F32



sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 40976EAF437D05B5

sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 3B4FE6ACC0B21F32

  
~~~
  

~~~

1.查看安装的所有软件

dpkg -l

例如：dpkg -l | grep ftp

  


2.查看软件安装的路径

dpkg -L | grep ftp

也可以用 whereis ftp

  


3.查看软件版本

aptitude show xxx

  


安装应用时使用

apt-get install

卸载应用时使用

sudo apt remove program_name

完全卸载应用

sudo apt purge program_name

如果不知道具体的应用名称或者开头字母，你可以 列出 Ubuntu 中所有已安装的包

apt list --installed | grep -i xxx

  


snap list

  


nano

字符终端文本编辑器

sudo nano /etc/pam.d/common-password

使用Ctrl+O来保存所做的修改 退出 按Ctrl+X

  


sudo passwd root 给root用户修改密码

su root 切换用户

  


root密码：52101985zzMzzM*

  
~~~


repo安装

sudo apt install repo

  


git config --global user.email "teitibou@163.com"

git config --global user.name "teitibou"

  
  


sudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list //在行尾添加如下两行的内容

deb http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ xenial main universe

deb-src http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ xenial main universe

  


cat /proc/cpuinfo来查看相关的cpu信息

lsb_release -a，查看发行版本信息，并且方法可以适用于所有的Linux发行版本。

  


cat /etc/issue可以查看到当前是Linux什么版本系统。

cat /proc/version可以查看内核的版本号。

  


which java 查找java

ls -lrt /usr/bin/java 查找文件快捷链接原地址

ln -s /usr/local/jvm/jdk1.8.0_303/ /usr/jdk 创建一个软连接

  


/usr/lib/jvm/java-11-openjdk-amd64/bin/java

  


du -sh ./folder ubuntu 查看文件夹大小

/usr/lib/jvm/java-11-openjdk-amd64

  


// 打开/etc/apt/sources.list

sudo nano /etc/apt/sources.list

//在最后粘贴以下两行

deb http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ xenial main universe

deb-src http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ xenial main universe

//ctrl +s 保存，ctrl + x退出

//在terminal执行

sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install libesd0-dev

  
  


工作有意义，生活有品质 git 操作operator

sanyusily.github.io/mdbook_site

  


$ git remote add origin https://github.com/sanyusily/sanyusily.github.io.git

$ git remote add origin git@github.com:sanyusily/sanyusily.github.io.git

  


$ git stash

$ git pull --rebase origin master

# change to your github repo

$ git stash pop

$ git rebase --continue

  


$ git branch -M develop

$ git push -u origin develop

  


mkdir quickstart-react-native

cd quickstart-react-native

git init

touch README.md

git add README.md

git commit -m "first commit"

git remote add origin https://gitee.com/sanyusily/quickstart-react-native.git

git push -u origin "master"

  
  
  


git branch --set-upstream-to=origin/master master

因为远程仓库新建时，有LIENCE，由于本地仓库和远程仓库有不同的开始点，也就是两个仓库没有共同的commit出现，无法提交，此时我们需要allow-unrelated-histories。也就是我们的 pull 命令改为下面这样的：

git pull origin master --allow-unrelated-histories

  


git remote -v

git remote add 仓库地址

git remote rm 仓库名称

  


$ ssh-keygen -t rsa

$ cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub

  


$ code . 打开vscode

  


解决git每次提交代码都要输入帐号密码

git config --global credential.helper store

  
  


github.com/oh-my-docker/jekyll-docker

  


$ sudo apt install docker.io

  
  
  


$ sudo apt-get install ruby ruby-dev 安装Ruby包和开发工具：

$ sudo apt-get install make build-essential 必需的构建工具

$ sudo gem install bundler 依赖包安装

$ sudo gem install jekyll

bundle exec jekyll -v

bundle exec jekyll serve

  


卸载重新安装jekyll

PACKAGES="$(dpkg -l |grep jekyll|cut -d" " -f3|xargs )"

sudo apt remove --purge $PACKAGES

sudo apt autoremove

sudo gem install jekyll jekyll-feed jekyll-gist jekyll-paginate jekyll-sass-converter jekyll-coffeescript

bundle update

  


bundle exec jekyll new myblog

bundle exec jekyll serve

  
  
  
  


https://github.com/oh-my-docker/jekyll-docker

  


docker pull quay.io/jetstack/cert-manager-cainjector:v0.12.0

docker pull quay-mirror.qiniu.com/jetstack/cert-manager-cainjector:v0.12.0

  


docker pull quay-mirror.qiniu.com/omd/jekyll

$ docker pull quay-mirror.qiniu.com/omd/jekyll

# 实际开发中常用的Linux命令和Android 指令

  
~~~css
- vim ~/.bashrc
~~~

## NDK添加如下信息

~~~NDK
export NDKROOT=/ndk解压目录/android-ndk-r21
export PATH=$NDKROOT:$PATH
~~~

  
## CMAKETEXT添加如下信息
~~~NDK
cmake -S . -B build

cmake --build build



cmake -S . -B build -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

cmake --build build

app.thread.scheduleLaunchActivity


add_executable()

add_library() 命令支持可选的三个互斥参数：STATIC | SHARED | MODULE

cmake -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

~~~

  


## 如何在Linux下安装cmake

~~~

sudo apt-get install cmake

  
  


如果没有安装g++,gcc,gdb，输入以下命令进行安装

sudo apt-get install build-essential

sudo apt install gdb
~~~
  
  


## 制作android系统线程方法

- 放在根目录，然后make xxx目标（去mk中看
~~~

adb push out/target/product/generic_x86/system/bin /data/local/

./android_thread



  


man abort

stdlib.h

~~~
  


the IDE is running low on memory

## 日志打印技巧：
~~~

adb shell

logcat -b all | grep hello

Log.i(TAG,"message",new Exception())

全局搜索字符串 grep "\.handleMeassage" ./ -rn

adb shell dumpsys activity activities

  
~~~



# 升级 npm
~~~

sudo apt update

sudo apt install nodejs

#不自带 npm 需要自行安装

sudo apt install npm


sudo npm install npm -g

  ~~~
  
  
~~~

//install compare software

https://www.scootersoftware.com/support.php?zz=kb_linux_install

  ~~~
~~~

buildToolsVersion = "33.0.1"

compileSdkVersion 33

sudo npm install n -g

# 下载最新稳定版

sudo n stable

# 下载最新版

sudo n lastest

# 查看已下载的版本

sudo n ls

# 切换 Node 版本

sudo n 18.21.1

  ~~~



# 安装React Native命令行界面。

|| appProject?.ext?.react?.enableHermes?.toBoolean()


  ~~~

npm install --legacy-peer-deps 解决安装问题

npm install -g react-native-cli

npm uninstall -g react-native-cli @react-native-community/cli

  
  


cd AwesomeProject

react-native run-ios

  


npm install redux // 生产环境的依赖

npm install redux -dev // 开发环境的依赖

npm uninstall redux

  
  
  ~~~

  ~~~

$ cd android

$ ./gradlew assembleRelease

// 实例化 metro Server启动 metro 构建 bundle处理资源文件

commandLine(*execCommand, bundleCommand, "--platform", "android", "--dev", "${devEnabled}",

"--reset-cache", "--entry-file", entryFile, "--bundle-output", jsBundleFile, "--assets-dest", resourcesDir,

"--sourcemap-output", enableHermes ? jsPackagerSourceMapFile : jsOutputSourceMapFile, *extraArgs)

ios打包：

npx react-native run-ios --configuration Release

shellScript = "export NODE_BINARY=node\n#export FORCE_BUNDLING=true\nexport BUNDLE_COMMAND=bundle\n../node_modules/react-native/scripts/react-native-xcode.sh\n";

  
  


https://gitee.com/nuogui/AndrCodeRepository.git

  


ps -ef | grep wechat | cut -c 11-16 | xargs sudo kill -9

  


ps -ef | grep -v wechat | cut -c 12-18

  
  ~~~


# 安装闹钟

- Find Pomodoro in Software Center or run


~~~
#git clone -b gnome-41 https://github.com/gnome-pomodoro/gnome-pomodoro.git

sudo apt-get install gnome-shell-pomodo

安装命令 sudo dpkg -i 文件名.deb

启动命令 /usr/local/sunlogin/bin/sunloginclient

卸载命令 sudo dpkg -r sunloginclient

  ~~~
  
  
~~~
uname -v

lsb_release -a


http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu xenial InRelease: 由于没有公钥，无法验证下列签名： NO_PUBKEY 40976EAF437D05B5 NO_PUBKEY 3B4FE6ACC0B21F32



sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 40976EAF437D05B5

sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 3B4FE6ACC0B21F32

  
~~~
  

~~~

1.查看安装的所有软件

dpkg -l

例如：dpkg -l | grep ftp

  


2.查看软件安装的路径

dpkg -L | grep ftp

也可以用 whereis ftp

  


3.查看软件版本

aptitude show xxx

  


安装应用时使用

apt-get install

卸载应用时使用

sudo apt remove program_name

完全卸载应用

sudo apt purge program_name

如果不知道具体的应用名称或者开头字母，你可以 列出 Ubuntu 中所有已安装的包

apt list --installed | grep -i xxx

  


snap list

  


nano

字符终端文本编辑器

sudo nano /etc/pam.d/common-password

使用Ctrl+O来保存所做的修改 退出 按Ctrl+X

  


sudo passwd root 给root用户修改密码

su root 切换用户

  


root密码：52101985zzMzzM*

  
~~~

sudo apt install repo

  


git config --global user.email "teitibou@163.com"

git config --global user.name "teitibou"

deb http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ xenial main universe

deb-src http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ xenial main universe

  


cat /proc/cpuinfo来查看相关的cpu信息

lsb_release -a，查看发行版本信息，并且方法可以适用于所有的Linux发行版本。

  


cat /etc/issue可以查看到当前是Linux什么版本系统。

cat /proc/version可以查看内核的版本号。

  


which java 查找java

ls -lrt /usr/bin/java 查找文件快捷链接原地址

ln -s /usr/local/jvm/jdk1.8.0_303/ /usr/jdk 创建一个软连接

  


/usr/lib/jvm/java-11-openjdk-amd64/bin/java

  


du -sh ./folder ubuntu 查看文件夹大小

/usr/lib/jvm/java-11-openjdk-amd64

//在最后粘贴以下两行

deb-src http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ xenial main universe

//ctrl +s 保存，ctrl + x退出

//在terminal执行

工作有意义，生活有品质 git 操作operator

$ git stash

$ git rebase --continue

  


$ git branch -M develop

touch README.md

git commit -m "first commit"

git branch --set-upstream-to=origin/master master

因为远程仓库新建时，有LIENCE，由于本地仓库和远程仓库有不同的开始点，也就是两个仓库没有共同的commit出现，无法提交，此时我们需要allow-unrelated-histories。也就是我们的 pull 命令改为下面这样的：

git pull origin master --allow-unrelated-histories

  


git remote -v

git remote rm 仓库名称

  


$ ssh-keygen -t rsa

$ code . 打开vscode

  


解决git每次提交代码都要输入帐号密码

git config --global credential.helper store

# 实际开发中常用的Linux命令和Android 指令

  
~~~css
- vim ~/.bashrc
~~~

## NDK添加如下信息

~~~NDK
export NDKROOT=/ndk解压目录/android-ndk-r21
export PATH=$NDKROOT:$PATH
~~~

  
## CMAKETEXT添加如下信息
~~~NDK
cmake -S . -B build

cmake --build build



cmake -S . -B build -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

cmake --build build

app.thread.scheduleLaunchActivity


add_executable()

add_library() 命令支持可选的三个互斥参数：STATIC | SHARED | MODULE

cmake -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

~~~

  


## 如何在Linux下安装cmake

~~~

sudo apt-get install cmake

  
  


如果没有安装g++,gcc,gdb，输入以下命令进行安装

sudo apt-get install build-essential

sudo apt install gdb
~~~
  
  


## 制作android系统线程方法

- 放在根目录，然后make xxx目标（去mk中看
~~~

adb push out/target/product/generic_x86/system/bin /data/local/

./android_thread



  


man abort

stdlib.h

~~~
  


the IDE is running low on memory

~~~

adb shell

全局搜索字符串 grep "\.handleMeassage" ./ -rn

~~~



# 升级 npm
~~~

sudo apt update

sudo apt install nodejs

#不自带 npm 需要自行安装

sudo apt install npm


sudo npm install npm -g

  ~~~
  
  
~~~

sudo n lastest

|| appProject?.ext?.react?.enableHermes?.toBoolean()


  ~~~

npm install --legacy-peer-deps 解决安装问题

npm install -g react-native-cli

npm uninstall -g react-native-cli @react-native-community/cli

  
  


cd AwesomeProject

react-native run-ios

npm install redux -dev // 开发环境的依赖

npm uninstall redux

  
  
  ~~~

  ~~~

$ ./gradlew assembleRelease

// 实例化 metro Server启动 metro 构建 bundle处理资源文件

commandLine(*execCommand, bundleCommand, "--platform", "android", "--dev", "${devEnabled}",

"--reset-cache", "--entry-file", entryFile, "--bundle-output", jsBundleFile, "--assets-dest", resourcesDir,

~~~NDK

cmake -S . -B build -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=YES

app.thread.scheduleLaunchActivity


add_executable()

~~~

sudo apt-get install cmake

sudo apt install gdb
